title: Calendar Wear
summary: This is Calendar for Android Wear.It's free and easy to download.
description: This is a Calendar for Android Wear.It's free and easy to download.FEATURES-Swipe up/down to see next/previous month.-The button [COLOR] of your application on your smartphone shows a color picker that changes the background color.-The button [ABOUT] of the application on your smartphone shows the version and license. - If you change the system language to Japanese, Japanese Holidays will automatically show up on the watch. REQUIREMENTS-This application needs Android 4.3 or above and Android Wear SmartWatch.NOTE-Tested with LG G Watch, Samsung GearLive, Motorola Moto360 and Android 5.0.- Updated calendar due to a revision of the Japanese National Holidays Laws in 2014 (in Japanese language).DISCLAIMER-On certain phones and watches, this aplication might not work.-You are using this application at your own risk with no warranty of any kind.
descriptionHTML:
This is a Calendar for Android Wear.
It's free and easy to download.



FEATURES
-Swipe up/down to see next/previous month.
-The button [COLOR] of your application on your smartphone shows a color picker that changes the background color.
-The button [ABOUT] of the application on your smartphone shows the version and license.
- If you change the system language to Japanese, Japanese Holidays will automatically show up on the watch.

REQUIREMENTS
-This application needs Android 4.3 or above and Android Wear SmartWatch.

NOTE
-Tested with LG G Watch, Samsung GearLive, Motorola Moto360 and Android 5.0.
- Updated calendar due to a revision of the Japanese National Holidays Laws in 2014 (in Japanese language).

DISCLAIMER
-On certain phones and watches, this aplication might not work.
-You are using this application at your own risk with no warranty of any kind.
comments: Does exactly what it's supposed to! I'm almost perfectly happy with this app, one star less for lack of option to set Monday as first day of the week. Please add this as a setting and I'll be delighted to rate 5 stars!
Looks good but Very smooth and nice calendar. But would be much better if you could click on a day and see your appointments.
Just a calendar Very simple calendar. No appointments, no configuration. But it works OK.
